metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3542 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2021-42739. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2021-42739. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2021-42739 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This was marked as a duplicate of CVE-2021-42739, see https://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1184673#c17
